sentence: our estimates of the net effect of y2k remediation efforts, on both our nation's overall labor productivity and on real gross domestic product, are that it will likely shave a tenth or two per year off our growth rate, but a more substantial effect is possible if some of the larger estimates of y2k costs turn out to be accurate.
